EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_HEADLINE: The most powerful Surface Book ever
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_COPY: A versatile laptop, tablet, and studio all in one sleek, portable powerhouse.
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_POPLEFT_COPY: Breathtaking graphics and razor-sharp resolution come alive on a display designed for Surface Pen* and touch.
EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_POPRIGHT_COPY: Choose from 15” and 13.5” displays. Both thin and light enough to take anywhere without sacrificing performance.
BATTERY_COPY: Power your day with longer battery life
EXPERIENCE_WORK_COPY: Explore the ultimate laptop for running powerful apps in Office, demanding graphics software, inking in Windows, and more, at work or on the go.
EXPERIENCE_WORK_POPLEFT_COPY: With up to 17 hours of battery life,* the Surface Book 2 packs 70% more battery life than MacBook Pro 13”.*
EXPERIENCE_WORK_POPLEFT_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
EXPERIENCE_WORK_POPRIGHT_COPY: Connect with USB 3.1, full-size SD card, and Surface Dock*, or use the USB-C port to charge devices, transfer files, and display video.
EXPERIENCE_WORK_POPTOP_COPY: Speed through intensive tasks in Dassault SOLIDWORKS, Autodesk® Maya®, Adobe® Premiere Pro®, and other desktop software.*
EXPERIENCE_CREATE_COPY: Draw and sketch comfortably and naturally. Add Surface Dial* and Pen* for an immersive creative experience.
EXPERIENCE_CREATE_POPLEFT_COPY: Unlock your creativity with easy access to shortcuts, controls, drawing tools, and more.
EXPERIENCE_CREATE_POPRIGHT_COPY: Sketch, shade, and paint with precision thanks to 4,096 pressure points that respond to the lightest touch.
EXPERIENCE_CREATE_POPTOP_COPY: Detach the screen with the push of a button and get more done with four modes of use.
EXPERIENCE_RELAX_COPY: Detach the screen, turn it around, and reattach to transform into View Mode. Perfect for watching your favorite shows.
EXPERIENCE_RELAX_POPLEFT_COPY: Move the display effortlessly with one hand using the innovative, next-generation hinge.
EXPERIENCE_RELAX_POPTOP_COPY: View vibrant colors and enhanced graphics on a beautiful 15” or 13.5” PixelSense™ Display.
EXPERIENCE_PLAY_COPY: Get the best PC gaming experience with incredible graphics and the latest quad-core powered Intel® Core™ processors. You can even pair your Xbox Wireless* controller.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_COPY: Write and draw naturally with Surface Pen to bring your ideas to life.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_ONE: Jot down notes, create amazing artwork, and more
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_TWO: Now with tilt,* greater sensitivity, and virtually no lag
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Surface Pen tilt functionality is currently available with Surface Pro and Surface Book 2.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_THREE: 4,096 pressure points respond to the lightest touch
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_FOUR: Rest your hand on the screen–just like a notebook
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_TRYIT_COPY: Pick up the Pen and start coloring.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_HEADLINE: Bring out the best of your Surface
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_COPY: Complete your experience with accessories designed to work perfectly with your device.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_POPLEFT_COPY: A completely new tool to interact with technology and create in the most natural, immersive way.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_POPTOP_COPY: Better and faster than ever, with precision ink on one end and a rubber eraser on the other.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_COPY: Surface Precision Mouse* delivers carefully calculated weight, stability, and magnetic scrolling for flawless, ultra-precise movement.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_INTERACTIVE_TRYIT_COPY: Use the mouse to move, click, and scroll.
BEST_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Full Windows 10 features and capabilities on an ultra-convenient device.
BEST_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Use Cortana* to set reminders on your PC and get it later on your phone. Access your photos, notes, and Office docs on all your devices (Android, iOS, etc.).
BEST_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Cortana available in select markets. Experience may vary by region and device.
BEST_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Sign in to your device and apps with a smile or a touch.
BEST_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Work anywhere, online or offline. Office 365 sold separately.
COMPARE_COPY: Compare features and specs to see how each Surface device stacks up.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_COPY: Work and play virtually anywhere with laptop-to-tablet versatility and all-day battery life*
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: 8th Generation Intel® Core™ processor for faster, smoother multitasking.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Ultra-portable design, starting at just 1.7 lbs and only 0.33” thin.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Up to 13.5 hours of video playback* and the power to do what you want on the go.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_THREE_LEGA: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Vibrant color and resolution. Perfect for Surface Pen*** and touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Fanless cooling system**** lets you work, play, and stream in peace.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_LEGAL: ****Fanless cooling system included with Surface Pro 6 i5 models only.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_COPY: Nearly 4x more power and up to 17 hours* of battery life, with blazing graphics in a 15” or 13.5” PixelSense™ Display.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_COPY_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_ONE_TITLE: Designed with innovation in every detail
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Lightweight and powerful with unprecedented performance in a laptop this size.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Up to 17 hours of battery life* and 70% more than MacBook Pro 13”.*
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Stunning color and graphics in 15” or 13.5” touchscreen displays.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Switch seamlessly between Laptop, Tablet, Studio, and View Modes.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Connect, charge, transfer, and display via USB-C, USB 3.1, full-size SD card, and Surface Dock.**
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_COPY: Take your ideas from concept to reality with blazing graphics, innovative features, and a 28” PixelSense™ Display.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_ONE_TITL: Designed for the way you work
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Use Surface Studio 2 upright, or draw on it like a drafting table.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Unlock your creativity with Surface Pen*, Surface Dial*, and touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_THREE_CO: Run all your favorite software, like Adobe® CC,* Office 365,* and more.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COP: 13.5 million pixels of pure, true-to-life color and clarity.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COP: 4x USB 3.0, USB-C, full-size SD™ card reader (SDXC compatible), 3.5mm headset jack, and 1 Gb Ethernet port.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_COPY: Lingo beyond the traditional laptop with the perfect balance of power and sleek design.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Clean, elegant details and rich, tone-on-tone color combinations.**
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_ONE_LEGAL: **Colors available on selected models only; available colors may vary by store.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Fast processors and up to 14.5 hours of battery life* in a 0.57” thin design.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_THREE_COP: Aluminum shell and durable Alcantara® keyboard–all at just 2.76 pounds.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Razor-sharp resolution on an interactive screen made for touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Omnisonic Speakers deliver crisp, clear audio for music, shows, and more.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_COPY: Laptop performance meets tablet portability to deliver the flexibility you need.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Only 0.33” thin and starting at just 1.15 lbs. to fit easily in your bag.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_TWO_TITLE: Fast, efficient, with performance that lasts
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Run day-to-day software and apps, plus full Windows 10 features.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_THREE_COP: Up to 9 hours of battery life* with fast charging.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_THREE_LEG: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Browse, work, and stream on the beautiful hi-res touchscreen.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Instantly adapt and adjust to home, travel, and everyday tasks.
